1.title: Officers' Wellness Program: Coping with Professional Trauma & PTSD

episode of.title: On Air with Dr. Harel (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

1.plot: Officer's Wellness Program is dedicated to Correctional and Police officers, as well as veterans. The goal of these series is to increase awareness of professional trauma, understand the physiological and psychological impact of trauma, and talk about constructive prevention and coping with professional trauma. Segment 1 - Why is it important for us to talk about trauma and PTSD?
